testcase.name: It can determine if it is for regular service
We can check if a ServiceDeliveryProfile is for a Special Service
setSplitByMonthlyCost will not set a split for invalid values
setSplitByMonthlyCost will not set a split for special services
setSplitByCostPerService fails to set split when given less than zero
setSplitByCostPerService fails to set split when the service delivery profile is not for a special service
We shouldn't be able to setSplitByPercent for percents below 0% or above 100%
getSplitByPercent returns the split in the format of the percent
getSplitByPercent will always show two and only two decimal places
We can get the amount that a ServiceDeliveryProfile specifies to a customer for SS type
We can get the amount that a ServiceDeliveryProfile specifies to a customer for RS type
